com.bergerkiller.bukkit.common.utils

Class NBTUtil

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.bergerkiller.bukkit.common.utils.NBTUtil

  • public class NBTUtil
extends java.lang.Object
    Contains utility functions for dealing with NBT data such as saving and loading

        public static void resetAttributes(org.bukkit.entity.LivingEntity livingEntity)

        livingEntity - to reset
